import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./Contact.css"; import line from "./images/line.png"; import line_svg from "./images/line-messenger.svg"; import MediaQuery from "react-responsive"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; function Contact() { const [status, setStatus] = useState("Submit"); const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log("buttom pushed"); setStatus("Sending..."); const { name, email, tel, message, options } = e.target.elements; let details = { name: name.value, email: email.value, tel: tel.value, message: message.value, options: options.value, }; let response = await fetch( "https://polymath-express.wl.r.appspot.com/contact", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json;charset=utf-8", }, body: JSON.stringify(details), } ); setStatus("Submit"); let result = await response.json(); alert(result.status); }; return (

); } export default Contact;
